Dragon's lair.description: There's a lot of gold at the other side, but the something between you and the gold...

Dark Cathedral.description: Once this was a blessed place, now there is only chaos.

The Upside Down.description: Everything is darker and full os gross roots. There's something lurking in the shadows...

Hunters Camp.description: This camp is abandoned, or maybe not. Be careful who you meet.

Cemitery.description: This is an old cemitery where ancient warriors who lost their lives in the past are buried. Beware of your enemies.

Alegrete Town.description: Take a rest, you are safe, if you stand the heat. Maybe pay a visit to the shop.

Elf Town.description: A beautiful building, with intricate details, made by beatiful elfs. This is a safe spot.

Green plains.description: This is a big open field. A lot of creatures make their nest in here.

Hell's cave.description: Everything is burning in this place. The peace is too far away.

Nightmare Ruins.description: A bunch of ruined building. Your nightmares are real here.

Temple of Death.description: This place looks more like a giant skull than a temple. Life is something strange.

Dark Forest.description: These woods is so dark that can hide basically any kind of creature.

Forest.description: A road goes through these woods. It looks like the perfect spot for an ambush.

Montain path.description: Around you there is only tall montains and the road is very winding. Careful not to be caught by surprise.

Grotesque Swamp.description: It's hard to walk around, everything is damp and moist. There's insects the size of you torso.

Arid fields.description: This is a big open field of dry plants e sun-baked rocks. It's just too hot here. Not as hot as Alegrete town though.
